CODEX CHRONOLOGY GALLERY TOOLS

First Exchange

The First Exchange was a series of communications and partnerships between Terran and Ikamo civilisations. It is generally defined as the period between first contact being made in 226, and first physical contact on board Gateway Prime in 274.

Background

Prior to first contact, Terrans develop tachyon communicators, allowing faster-than-light communications by sending particles through hyperspace. On 2 June 205, Terrans intercepted an unknown communication which would later prove to be of Ikamo origin; Subsequent communications were intercepted on 2 June 220 and then again on 7 September 226. Analysis of the signal confirmed it was of artificial origin, and the source was triangulated to Koa.

In the following year of 227, the First Contact Tone was relayed to the Koa system.
